Sarah lost control and gasped as she felt her behind push her load into the back of her diaper. Allie's face grew into a smile as she saw what was happening.

Sarah continued to push her mess into her diapers and her face grew red as she did so. She came to a finish and looked back at her behind. She saw that her sagging diaper hung just below her skirt, making it slightly visible to everyone.

"Oh my god! You just pooped your diaper!" Allie whispered, laughing as she spoke, "You just used your diapers in front of all these people!"

"Please, Allie, let's just get out of here," Sarah begged, tugging her skirt down to cover her messy diaper.

"Does baby want her diaper changed?" cooed Allie.

Sarah's face burned red as she nodded.
122321122.title: go shopping.

choices: Allie continues to change Sarah's diapers
1223212.content:
Sarah decides to do it while standing. She didn't want her mess to spread around by sitting and doing it.

The pressure grew even more on Sarah's behind. She bent her knees slightly and began to push.

"This is so humiliating," Sarah thought. She continued to push, but nothing was coming out. Suddenly, she felt the first load drop into her diapers, pushing them down.

"Are you pooping yet?" asked Allie from outside, "I want to hear you messing your diapers."

Sarah ignored her and continued to poop in her diapers. She pushed harder and her diapers grew.

Sarah's diapers crinkled as she pooped and Allie heard. Allie began laughing. "You're pooping your diapers! A 19 year old is pooping in diapers!"

A few minutes passed by, but Sarah was not yet done pooping herself. She continued pushing and her diapers grew even more in the back. They began to sag below her skirt. Slowly, Sarah came to a stop, her diapers filled. She sighed and stood up to her full height.

"Are you done yet? Are you ready for me to change your diapers?" asked Allie.

Sarah opened the door and walked out.

Allie began to laugh. "Turn around. I want to see your messy butt!"

Sarah reluctantly turned around, her face growing red. Allie lifted up Sarah's skirt to reveal her full diaper.

"Wow, you really did it," said Allie, "You really pooped yourself in a diaper." Allie felt the back of Sarah's diaper. She gave Sarah's behind a smack and Sarah winced as her mess touched her butt for a brief second.

"Well, nothing left to be done but to change Baby Sarah's dirty diapers." said Allie, "Hop up on the diaper changing table so I can change your diaper." Sarah climbed up onto the changing table.

"Haha, just like a baby," laughed Allie, "You'll be getting your filled diapers changed on top of a diaper changing table like a little baby."

Then!!!

"PEW!" Allie shouted as she wrinkled her nose. "Someone's a stinky baby."

Sarah bit her tongue and allowed Allie to keep changing her. Allie held up Sarah's legs as she wiped her tooshie clean with some baby wipes. She rolled up the used diaper and threw it away. She then applied a generous ammount of baby lotion before reaching into her bag and pulling out a new diaper. She unfolded it and Sarah lifted her hips and let her slip the article under her.

Allie pulled the new diaper up over Sarah's crotch and fixed the six tapes to fix snugly around her. She then repositioned the lockable diaper and helped Sarah off of the table. She fixed her skirt for her and gave her a hard slap on her bottom.

12232122.title: Allie continues to change Sarah's diapers

122321221.content:
Allie and Sarah walked to one of the most popular clothing stores in the mall. There were quite a few people inside, and Sarah was quite nervous about people possibly noticing her diapers. The two girls tried on multiple articles. Allie even made Sarah try on some panties over her diaper just to taunt her.

"These look so cute on you," Allie commented as she snapped the pink lacey thong Sarah was wearing.

"Shut up!" Sarah snapped with a blush.

"Hey, be nice to me. After all, I'm the one who decides when your diapers get changed," Allie replied.

As if on que, Sarah felt a pressure in her bladder. She did her best to ignore it ss she and Allie finished up their shopping and went on to the next store. The pressure in her bladder increased untill it was released with a muted hiss as the diaper absorbed the liquid. The inner diaper sagged against the outer, causing it to lower below her skirt's hem line. She nervously tapped Allie on the shoulder.

"Can you please change me?" She asked quietly.

To her horror, Allie grabbed the area between her legs and squeezed it.

"It can still hold more in it," she replied. "Besides, I just changed you not too long ago. You'll be fine."

The girls continued their shopping trip. Sarah was very aware of the warm wet diaper sloshing against her. She was now very self concious about someone seeing her diapers. A few hours later, Sarah had the urge to go again and wet her diaper for the second time. The already soaked diaper was flooded again and began to leak into the second. The diapers drooped even lower and the outer one was not tinted yellow.

"Alright, its time so go home so lets change your diaper for the road," Allie said as she led Sarah to another public bathroom.
122321221.title: clothes shopping."

"Wow, you really soaked these," she said as she rolled up the second diaper and threw it away.

Sarah was wiped down and another diaper was unfolded and slid underneath her. Some baby powder was sprinkled on her snd the clean diaper was folded over her with the tapes fixed for a snug fit. Then the soaked locking diaper was fixed over it.

The outer diapers still wet!" Sarah complained.

"But its the only locking diaper I have so you'll just have to wait untill bed time," Allie replied with a large smile.

She helped Sarah off the changing table and the two made their way out to the car. The wet outer diaper sagged heavily between Sarah's legs, and she could feel it swing back and forth with every step. The diaper squished as Sarah sat down in the passenger seat. The two drove home to their appartment.

1353.content:
"...Sunshine Day Care?" Sarah read out loud. She looked at Allie with a shocked expression. "You actually brought me to a day care, like, for babies!"

"That's right," Allie laughed. "This is where you're going to stay during the day. I do have work to go to, you know."

The two girls got out of the car, Sarah more begrudgingly, and walked into the day care. There was one lady who was ready to meet them at the door.

"Hi, Allie! " she greeted. She then looked to Sarah. "And hello to you too, little miss." She said as if talking to a todler.

"These guys already know about our arrangement," Allie explained.

"Now the only issue is where to place you," the woman said.

"Place me?" Sarah questioned.

"Yes, the groups are seperated by age and behavior," she explained. "First there are the guppies, which is our three and under group. Then the dolphins, our todlers. Then there's the sharks, which are kindergardeners and first graders staying here after school untill their parents pick them up. info.brief_description: Sarah has lost a bet made to her friend, Allie. Now she has to wear diapers for a week!
info.description: Sarah has lost a bet to her friend, Allie, during a game of poker. Sarah is 19, a year older than her friend Allie. Sarah's side of the deal, if she lost the bet that is, is that she has to avoid the toilet for an entire week and wear diapers instead. You get to decide the fortunes(or misfortunes) poor Sarah must face during her diapered week.
